Package database

Class UserDatabase

java.lang.Object
database.UserDatabase
All Implemented Interfaces:
Database<User>
public class UserDatabase extends Object implements Database<User>
The database containing all the user data from .csv.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static UserDatabase getInstance()
      Provides access to the single instance of the UserDatabase class, creating it if it does not exist.
      Returns:
      The single instance of UserDatabase.

    • load

      public ArrayList<User> load()
      Loads camp data from a CSV file into the application. Parses each line of the file into a Student or Staff object and adds it to the list of users.
      Specified by:
      load in interface Database<User>
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of User objects representing all users loaded from the CSV files.

    • update

      public void update()
      Updates the CSV files with the current user data. Serializes each user object back to the respective CSV file, separating students and staff.
      Specified by:
      update in interface Database<User>

    • getUsers

      public ArrayList<User> getUsers()
      Gets the list of all users.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of User objects.

    • getUserByID

      public User getUserByID(String userID)
      Finds a user by their unique ID.
      Parameters:
      userID - The unique identifier for the user.
      Returns:
      The User object with the corresponding userID, or null if not found.
